description.value:
Made from soft leather, with delicate white wings attached near the ankles, these sandals are ensorcelled with powerful air magic.

Whenever you fall while wearing these sandals, they automatically cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gentle Landing] on you. This benefit can't trigger again for 10 minutes.

Activateâ€”Awaken Wings D air, concentrate

Frequency once per day

Effect You speak a command word and click the boots' heels together to cause the wings to animate and flap rapidly, granting you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Winged Sandals]
